body:
Use Cases

Mobile app install ads drive site visitors to download your mobile apps directly from your Facebook mobile ads. This highly targeted ad unit offers a number of opportunities, including:

  • Travel advertisers targeting customers who recently purchased a ticket or booked a room, to drive downloads of a branded app before their trip.
  • Finance advertisers promoting their mobile app to desktop customers, to encourage on-the-go account access.
  • Retailers promoting an m-Commerce app, to increase purchase frequency from their most loyal customers.

Facebook mobile ads combine the power of retargeting with social capabilities such as likes, shares, or comments on the user’s preferred device to increase organic interest.

Technical Requirements

File Format: .JPEG, .GIF (static), or PNG

File size: 1MB maximum

Ad Size: 1200×627

Title (required): App name

Body Text (required): 130 characters, including spaces

Destination URL: App store URL (iTunes or Google Play)

FB App ID: Found in the Basic Settings section of your Facebook Developers account.

Additional Notes

  • IMPORTANT: Facebook notes that images with minimal text are more engaging for audiences. Only 20% of any image can be text, including logos. Use this grid tool as you build your creative images.
  • Animated images are not permitted on Facebook.
  • The following characters are not allowed at this time: @ > # $ % ^ &* ( ) <
  • No single word used in the creative can be longer than 20 characters.

How do I set up a Mobile App Install campaign on Facebook?

It’s quick and easy to launch your first Facebook mobile campaign from your AdRoll dashboard. Before you begin, note that Facebook requires the 1200×627 ad size for mobile app install.

Mobile app install launch guide

1. Log into your AdRoll dashboard and click "Create New Campaign", then "Get Started" with Facebook.

2. Campaign Settings: Name your campaign and set a weekly budget. Your Campaign Objective for a MAI campaign is "App Installs".

3. Target Visitors: Choose your audience. Keep in mind that you’re primarily reaching out to previous desktop visitors on their mobile devices.

4. Add Ads & Select Placement: Choose "Upload New" for new ads or "Choose Existing" to add from your Ad Library. Click here for guidelines on creating your MAI ad.

5. Review & Finish: Once you've finalized campaign details, click "Launch" to submit for approval.

How do I track conversions on a Mobile App Install campaign?

To set up tracking for app downloads, enter your Facebook app ID when you upload your creative.

Registering your app on Facebook

1. Go to https://developers.facebook.com/apps

2. Click "Create an App"

3. Fill in the required information.

Once registered, you'll have a unique Facebook app ID to use.

More information on SDKs and Facebook

An SDK, short for Software Development Kit, is similar to a pixel on a website: it allows you to view metrics and performance for your mobile apps. You can only track app downloads in the AdRoll dashboard if your SDK is either the Facebook SDK or one of Facebook's approved mobile mobile measurement partners. Read more about SDKs, and why advertisers implement them, in Facebook's support center.
